name: USB Flashing Format
summary: A UF2 file is a binary data file used by the Microsoft Programming Experience Toolkit (PXT) and MakeCode. It contains a program that can be transferred from a PC to a microcontroller, such as an Arduino circuit board. UF2 files can be opened and edited using a variety of Microsoft MakeCode editors.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

images.caption: UF2 file open in Microsoft MakeCode Arcade
images.alt: UF2 file open in Microsoft MakeCode Arcade
